p: For the T. montanum essential oils, as shown in the loading graph ( Figure 1), all variables affected PC1 and PC2. In fact, PC1 (51.6%) was represented mainly by oxygenated sesquiterpene (OS) in the positive score, and in a minor contribution by MH, OM and O in negative scores; meanwhile, PC2 (27.7%) was represented mainly by a negative score of SH and positive scores of MH and OS.
